name: com.mazegenerator.library
description: A comprehensive, production-ready C# library for generating, modifying, rendering, and solving mazes. Includes 5 generation algorithms (Recursive Backtracker, Kruskal's, Prim's, Eller's, Wilson's), 3 maze types (Perfect, Braided, WithRooms), 2 rendering formats (ASCII, SVG), and 2 solving algorithms (BFS, DFS).
